title: Come see our gorgeous renovated 1050 sq ft 2 bedroom / 2 bathroom!
posting_body: ['The Enclave at Riverdale - A place to call home!', 'Bed: 2 / Bath: 2', 'Sq.', 'Footage: 1050', 'sq ft', 'Rent: $1446/Month', 'Terms: 6-Month,10-Month,11-Month,12-Mont', 'show contact info', 'Enjoy our gorgeous lakeside views with a lakeside swimming pool and sun deck, 24-hour fitness center, tennis courts and 24-hour laundry facility.', 'At The Enclave, you are connected to downtown Atlanta, Camp Creek Shopping and dining, Camp Creek Marketplace, Atlanta Hartsfield-Jackson International Airport and convenient to Southern Regional, Grady Memorial, South Fulton Hospital.', 'Come visit today and learn more about our Preferred Employers Discounts.', 'Our Apartment Homes Feature:', '◾ Air Conditioning/Heating', '◾ Cable Ready', '◾ Carpet', '◾ Ceiling Fans', '◾ Dining Room', '◾ Dishwasher', '◾ Disposal', '◾ Kitchen', '◾ Range', '◾', 'Tub/Shower', '◾ Fireplace in Select Units', '◾ Full unit upgrade', '◾ High Speed Internet Access', '◾ Microwave', '◾ Plank Flooring', '◾ Vinyl Flooring', '◾ Walk-In Closets', '◾ Washer/Dryer Hookup', '◾ Window Coverings', 'Our Residents Enjoy:', '◾ Cardio & Fitness Center', '◾ Community Events', '◾ On-site Maintenance', '◾', 'On-Site Management', '◾ Pet Care', '◾ Resort Style Swimming Pool', '◾ Basketball Court', '◾ Business Center Coming Soon!', '◾ Clothes Care Center', '◾ Community Lake', '◾ Electronic Rent Payment', '◾ Package Receiving', '◾ Tennis Court', 'Contact Info:', 'show contact info', '1507 Pine Dr', 'College Park, GA 30349', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'Mon - Fri: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM', 'Sat: 10:00 AM - 5:00 PM', 'Sun: 1:00 PM - 5:00 PM', 'Pets:', 'A maximum of 2 pet per unit shall be accepted.', 'The pet fee is $300 Non-Refundable per pet.', '$15 pet monthly fee.', 'A pet addendum must be completed and pet fees must be paid prior to moving in.', 'If there is more than one pet per unit, the combined weight of the 2 pets cannot exceed 50 lbs.', 'Please call our Leasing Office for complete Pet Policy information.', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', 'BA913DDE96A449F']
